title: 14p Rectangular block in Residential area
details:
This 14 perch land with good access roads and is situated in a quiet neighborhood. It is 250m to the main road and only 350m to Kohuwala junction. Land value in this area is rapidly appreciating. Don't miss this opportunity to build your dream home.
